name: Tanner's Dye
flavorText: Leatherworkers use a variety of oils to seal their skins with a rich, natural brown pigment.
flavorTextHtml: Leatherworkers use a variety of oils to seal their skins with a rich, natural brown pigment.
description: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
descriptionHtml: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
